title: JST, John 13
content: wash my feet. Jesus answered him, If I wash thee not, thou hast no part with me.
Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.
Jesus saith to him, He that
needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit; and ye are clean, but not all.
Now this was the custom of the Jews under their law; wherefore, Jesus did this that the law might be fulfilled.
